actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To adjust the designation of controlled airspace around the Dallas/Forth Worth Airport, Texas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to take appropriate action to adjust from seven miles to eight miles the controlled airspace boundary around the Dallas/Fort Worth Airport, Texas.

titles.title: To adjust the designation of controlled airspace around the Dallas/Forth Worth Airport, Texas, and for other purposes.
